content:
Hi @nagisa -- so here are the weeks when I am on vacation (a subset of @pnkfelix's plans):

  • July 18: :beach: -- definitely cannot run this one
  • July 25: :shrug: I could probably run this one
  • August 1: :shrug: Not sure yet -- maybe?
  • August 8: :beach: -- definitely cannot run this one

I guess we can figure out July 25 / August 1 a bit later? :)
Sure. I may have to fly to the US some time for a few weeks too, but I don’t know exactly when quite yet, so at worst some of meetings will get cancelled.
Hey @nagisa so I plan to do July 25, at least ( unless you really want to =) )
Also, I will try to put in a bit of time doing reviews and skimming minutes from previous week
(Feel free to drop any notes here if there are particular highlights)
@nagisa actually August 1 is impossible for me to do -- are you still able to do it?
Most likely I'll be able to, yeah.

@nagisa I've put a PR up with a dynamic checkin schedule so if it's merged before the meeting, then the website should have the working groups to check-in: https://github.com/rust-lang/compiler-team/pull/139
I'm back now btw so I can run this week's meeting
still have to catch up on the last week though!
of course @nagisa if you prefer to run, wfm :)
The past two meetings I ran were cut short
so perhaps I’m too distracted after all to run anything, but I can give a shot and run it this week as well
I won't be around on RustConf actually
so if you'd prefer, I can run this week and you can try for the week after that :)
